case 28169 is irrelative with my code , when i add this code that orphaned case appears , when i dont add this code

case 28178: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton < 300000) { c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.specialAmount += 100; c.specAttack(); c.sM("You've restored your special attack"); break;

it doesnt
my question is , is this code wrong???
cuz i really need to use it!

item.title: Need help ASAP! [ 317 ]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[code=java]
switch (orphaned) {
case 1:
break;

    case 2:
    break;

}
case 3:
break;[/code]

That would be causing the orphaned case error, because it’s outside of a switch statement.

[code=java]switch (fixed) {
case 1:
break;

    case 2:
    break;

    case 3:
    break;

}[/code]

As for your other error remember, you enclose an if condition in parentheses, but you don’t put a semicolon after the condition. If find more than one statement between an if and its else, look for brackets. If the statements between if and else aren’t surrounded by brackets, thats the reason why you are getting the error. (Most likely.)

Read full topic

item.title: Need help ASAP! [ 317 ]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

i’m trying to make one of my action buttons usable every 5 minutes , this is the code that i wrote , and its not working.

case 28178: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastButton < 300000) { c.lastButton = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.specialAmount += 100; c.specAttack(); c.sM("You've restored your special attack"); break;

and this is the error

clickingMost.java:2070: orphaned case case 28169: ^ clickingMost.java:3877: reached end of file while parsing }→ ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
